reviews.review_msg: Richard is a nice guy. The course material wasn't too bad, but I found the lecture slides very empty and confusing. He also uses tons of british terminology which can be quite annoying!! Overall he's a good professor though.

Great prof and really works to make the class interesting. The exams weren't particularly easy but if you regularly review the content and pay attention in class you'll do great! No textbook so it was hard to get focused on the class.

Great prof! Very fun which makes the class more interesting, but he also just teaches interesting material in the first place, so it was easy to follow along with sometimes he cuts class short which is awesome , other times he uses the full time. Just depends on the amount of material for that week. No textbook! just his links that arent too long!

Richard is an absolute delight! His exams are challenging and his lecture slides are designed so that you HAVE to attend class but if you go and pay attention and know all the details, you will do fine on his broad exam questions. His stories are hilarious and he's extremely approachable.
